{{cpp/experimental/title|simd_cast|static_simd_cast}}
{{cpp/experimental/simd/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|experimental/simd}}
{{dcl|since=parallelism_ts_2|num=1|
template&lt; class V, class T, class Abi &gt;
/*see below*/ simd_cast( const simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;&amp; v ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=parallelism_ts_2|num=2|
template&lt; class V, class T, class Abi &gt;
/*see below*/ static_simd_cast( const simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;&amp; v ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Cast a simd object to another simd object. If V is T, returns {{c|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}}; otherwise, if V is a scalar type, returns {{c|simd&lt;V, simd_abi::fixed_size&lt;simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;::size()&gt;&gt;}}. Otherwise, V must be a simd type, and the function returns V.

@1@ This function does not participate in overloading resolution unless
* every possible value of the input element can be represented with the output element,
* either {{c|is_simd_v&lt;V&gt;}} is false, or {{c|V::size()}} is {{c|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;::size()}}.

@2@ This function does not participate in overloading resolution unless either {{c|is_simd_v&lt;V&gt;}} is false, or {{c|V::size()}} is {{c|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;::size()}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|v|the input simd object}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A simd object with the i-th element initialized to {{c|static_cast&lt;To&gt;(v[i])}}, where To is the output element type as specified.

===Notes===
The TS specification is missing {{c|simd_cast}} and {{c|static_simd_cast}} overloads for {{c|simd_mask}}. The libstdc++ implementation provides the missing overloads in the {{c|std::experimental::__proposed}} namespace. If you already use the
{{source|1=
namespace stdx = std::experimental;
}}
shortcut, you might be interested to use
{{source|1=
namespace stdx {
  using namespace std::experimental;
  using namespace std::experimental::__proposed;
}
}}
instead. Alternatively, libstdc++ implements a {{c|__cvt()}} member function in {{c|simd_mask}}, which allows implicit conversion of the mask. See also: https://github.com/VcDevel/std-simd/issues/41
